sections.title: What is a Distance Sensor?
sections.content: A distance sensor measures how far away an object is from the sensor. In FTC, distance sensors are used for tasks like obstacle avoidance, alignment, and detecting game elements.

sections.title: Configuring and Mapping a Distance Sensor
sections.content:
